meanings.definition: A community, place, or situation regarded as encapsulating in miniature the characteristics of something much larger.
meanings.sent1: In our school, the classroom is like a microcosmos of the entire town.
meanings.sent2: The ant farm is a perfect example of a microcosmos, showing how ants work together.
meanings.sent3: The family picnic turned into a microcosmos of chaos when the dog stole the sandwiches.
meanings.sent4: The snow globe created a beautiful microcosmos of a winter wonderland.
meanings.sent5: The dollhouse was a detailed microcosmos of a bustling city.
